Articles.Content:
Not sure if anyone else is a NAR member or not, but check out this neat site. you can use Rocksim to design and test your own rockets and the company will make them for you...

kinda neat !

http://www.apogeerockets.com/
Yeah! Nice to see another into model rocketry I've been using rocksim for about 3 years now and it works great!
I wanted to try out their 30 day trial, but I don't get the mail with a download link. I double checked everything, and even tried with my dad's E-Mail.
